title.rendered: Best CSR Excellence in Healthcare Award by ASSOCHAM

content.rendered: Smile Foundation received the ASSOCHAM Best CSR Excellence in Healthcare Award, a recognition that celebrates the unyielding dedication of our health team working across the country. Their hard work has allowed us to bring essential healthcare to underserved and remote communities, reaching some of the most challenging regions and those in need. Beyond medical care, our teams create awareness about child and maternal health, elderly care, and preventive practices for healthier lives.
